customrecordcustomfield.help: Select a vendor from the list then compare the Subsidiary details with that on the vendor invoice.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Vendor Invoice Upload

customrecordcustomfield.defaultvalue:
1. Validate the subsidiary address on the vendor bill
matches that in the Subsidiary Details
2.If they do not match
check the Legal Entity Mismatch box
3. If they do not match please select a different vendor
customrecordcustomfield.label: Subsidiary Instructions (Invoice Upload)

customrecordcustomfield.help: This field will populate based on vendor selection. This will show address of company where services/item was delivered. User need to check 'Subsidiary details validated ' field if all details are correct. Note : If address is not correct make sure you have selected correct vendor.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Subsidiary Details (Invoice Upload)

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the purchase order that is on the vendor invoice. Note : List will show the POs which are open against the selected vendor.
customrecordcustomfield.label: PO Number (Invoice Upload)

customrecordcustomfield.help: Check in case PO stated in Invoice is not present in the list of open POs.
customrecordcustomfield.label: PO Stated is NOT in the list

customrecordcustomfield.help: Check this box if PO is not mentioned on the invoice.
customrecordcustomfield.label: No PO on the Vendor Invoice

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter any additional information relevant to this vendor invoice that is not captured on the available fields.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Notes (Invoice Upload)

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter bill reference number and check 'Vendor bill duplicate check' field. If there is any bill in drop down that means there is already a bill posted with the same reference number against selected vendor.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Vendor Bill (Invoice Upload)

customrecordcustomfield.help: If there is any value in drop down that means there is already a bill posted with the same reference number against selected vendor. Select the invoice available in drop down and system will show the PO details against which old invoice was accounted.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Vendor Bill Duplicate Check

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the amount of invoice.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Amount (Invoice Upload)

customrecordcustomfield.help:
User needs to check this box once bill is accounted in NS.
Once this is checked invoice will be removed from the pending queue.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Vendor Bill Posted

customrecordcustomfield.help: Field will display currency of selected PO.
customrecordcustomfield.label: PO Currency (Invoice Upload)

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select currency of vendor bill from the drop down.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Vendor Bill Currency (Invoice Upload)

customrecordcustomfield.help: Check this box if subsidiary details are not correct.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Legal Entity Mismatch (Invoice Upload)

customrecordcustomfield.help: This box will be selected if PO currency matches with bill currency.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Currency Match (Invoice Upload)

customrecordcustomfield.help: This box will be selected if PO currency mis-matches with bill currency.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Currency Mis-match

customrecordcustomfield.defaultvalue:
1. Select the vendor in the Vendor Name field
2. If you cannot find the vendor, enter their details
in the Details of Vendor IF NOT IN LIST box
customrecordcustomfield.label: Vendor Name Instructions

customrecordcustomfield.help: If vendor is not available in drop down please enter details of vendor(i.e. name, subsidiary, PO mentioned on invoice).
customrecordcustomfield.label: Details of Vendor IF NOT IN LIST

customrecordcustomfield.help: This field will show PO number in case invoice you are uploading is a duplicate.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Duplicate Bill Posted To

customrecordcustomfield.help: This field is to assign the record to one of the AP invoice clerk for further processing.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Assigned to

customrecordcustomfield.defaultvalue:
1. Input the Vendor Invoice Number
2. Select the Duplicate Check drop-down
3. If you see an entry, select it
4. If you select an entry,
the Duplicate Posting will populate
customrecordcustomfield.label: Duplicate Check Instructions

customrecordcustomfield.help: User needs to enter invoice date on this. Depending on this date value, system will calculate the due date.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Invoice Date

customrecordcustomfield.help: This field will display the payment term of Vendor.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Payment Term

customrecordcustomfield.help: This field will show the Due date for payment depending on Invoice date and payment term. Note: This field will be populated after VIU record save.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Due Date

customrecordcustomfield.help: This field will display the amount of Invoice in USD. It will be populate after VIU record save.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Amount in USD

customrecordcustomfield.help: This field will display the amount of Invoice in EUR. It will be populate after VIU record save.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Amount in EUR

customrecordcustomfield.help: Please check this check box if it is an urgent payment.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Urgent Payment?

customrecordcustomfield.help: This field will display current status of selected purchase orders.
customrecordcustomfield.label: PO Status

customrecordcustomfield.help: This field will display the remaining amount for the selected PO. Note: This field will show the amount after saving the VIU record.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Remaining Amount

customrecordcustomfield.help: User needs to check this checkbox if modification is required in selected PO.
customrecordcustomfield.label: PO modification required?

customrecordcustomfield.help: Check this check box if you want to put some extra information about this VIU record. On checking this, Note field will be mendatory.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Others (Refer Note)

customrecordcustomfield.help: This field will be mendatory on selecting "Other(Refer Note) option in Exception Resolution list.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Note

customrecordcustomfield.help: This field will display Vendor of migrated PO.
customrecordcustomfield.label: New Vendor
Check this box if Invoice is from Vendor

customrecordcustomfield.description: This checkbox is to identify whether the Invoice is a PS Contractor invoice
customrecordcustomfield.help: This checkbox is to identify whether the Invoice is a PS Contractor invoice
customrecordcustomfield.label: PS Contractor Invoice

customrecordcustomfield.description: This checkbox identifies whether the PS Contractor Invoice has been approved by the PO requester
customrecordcustomfield.help: This checkbox identifies whether the PS Contractor Invoice has been approved by the PO requester
customrecordcustomfield.label: PS Approval Obtained
